title: New icon?
body:
Hey does anyone know what the new blue summoner icon from riot is for? It is a blue hammer looking weapon in someone's hands. I really like the icon but just want to know what it is for  and how to get it

I added a link to the icon.
https://avatar.leagueoflegends.com/EUW/RAiNleet.png

replies.body: This icon was sent to players who participated in the alpha test and logged in by the 15th, and was announced in the [6.22 patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-622-notes#patch-league-client-update).  Be sure to thank players you see with the icon for helping to test the updated client!
Also, might worth noting (since OP asked) that in the icon is Heimerdinger's hand holding his Hextech wrench (as he's the "mascot" of the League Client Update). :P
Alpha testers for the new client got the icon as a mystery gift from Riot. :)
